Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01046"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-search',plain:true" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01046/Search',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-detail',plain:true" Title="查看" ActionValue="4" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01046/Detail',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01046/Create',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01046/Edit',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="批量修改" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlgPL('datagrid','批量修改','/Page/P01046/EditP',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="64" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01046/Delete',400,300)" /> <UIButton /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01046/Query',fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="EmployeeID"> <Column Title="AutoKey" FieldName="AutoKey" IsCheckBox="true" /> <Column Title="公司" FieldName="Cname" /> <Column Title="部门" FieldName="Dname" /> <Column Title="职位" FieldName="Pname" /> <Column Title="姓名" FieldName="Ename" /> <Column Title="银行" FieldName="Bank" /> <Column Title="账号" FieldName="Account" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="基本工资" FieldName="BaseSalary" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="职位工资" FieldName="PostSalary" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="养老金" FieldName="Yanglaojin" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="医疗金" FieldName="Yiliaojin" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="失业金" FieldName="Shiyejin" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="公积金" FieldName="Gongjijin" /> <Column HAlign="Right" Title="团费" FieldName="Tuanfei" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Command.Name: 检索页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Null" Type="Const" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="公司" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="Company" Name="CompanyID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false" Binding="Company" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetCompanyName&Key=" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root='+rec.ID+'&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID='+rec.ID;
var url1='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByCmpOrDept&ID='+rec.ID;
var url2='/Share/Query?name=GetPositionByDeptID&DeptID=';
$('#DeptID').combotree({url:url});
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url1});
$('#JobID').combobox({url:url2});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="部门" FieldType="ComboTree"> <ComboTree Tag="input" ID="DeptID" Name="DeptID" Class="edit-input easyui-combotree" Options="editable:false" Binding="/Parameters[Null]" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root=000000&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID=xxxxxx" DisplayMember="text" ValueMember="id" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=&DeptID='+rec.id;
var url1='/Share/Query?name=GetPositionByDeptID&DeptID='+rec.id;
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url});
$('#JobID').combobox({url:url1});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="JobID" Name="JobID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false" Binding="/Parameters[Null]" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetPositionByDeptID&DeptID=" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&DeptID='+$('#DeptID').combotree('getValue')+'&JobID='+rec.ID;
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="姓名" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="EmployeeID" Name="EmployeeID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Binding="/Parameters[Null]" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&DeptID=&JobID=" IsAutoHeight="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01046"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01046/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query
Action.Title: 检索
Action.Command: <ScalarCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="执行查询" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_SalarySet" CommandName="QueryCount" SqlType="Scalar"> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="Request[EmployeeID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="JobID" Path="Request[JobID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="Request[DeptID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="Request[CompanyID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="UserID" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> </ScalarCommand>

<QueryCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="搜索结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_SalarySet" CommandName="QueryPage"> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="Request[EmployeeID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="JobID" Path="Request[JobID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="Request[DeptID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="Request[CompanyID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Rows" Path="Request[Rows]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Page" Path="Request[Page]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="UserID" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="rows" Path="Results[执行查询].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行查询].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行查询].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="total" Path="Results[查询总数].Value" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Path="LastResult.Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> Binding="Yanglaojin" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="医疗金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Yiliaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Yiliaojin" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="失业金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Shiyejin" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Shiyejin" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="公积金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Gongjijin" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Gongjijin" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> Command.Name: 新增页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="公司" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="Company" Name="Company" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择公司'" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetCompanyName&Key=" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root='+rec.ID+'&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID='+rec.ID;
var url1='/Share/Query?name=GetBankByCompanyID&CompanyID='+rec.ID;
var url2='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=xxxxxx&DeptID=xxxxxx';
var url3='/Share/Query?name=GetPositionByDeptID&DeptID=xxxxxx';
$('#EmployeeID').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Position').textbox('setValue','');
$('#HireDate').textbox('setValue','');
$('#State').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Account').textbox('setValue','');
$('#BaseSalary').textbox('setValue','');
$('#PostSalary').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Yanglaojin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Yiliaojin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Shiyejin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Gongjijin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Tuanfei').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Department').combotree({url:url});
$('#Bank').combobox({url:url1});
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url2});
$('#Position').combobox({url:url3});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="部门" FieldType="ComboTree"> <ComboTree Tag="input" ID="Department" Name="Department" Class="edit-input easyui-combotree" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择部门'" Length="8" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetDeptTreeByCompanyID&resultformat=jsontree&root=000000&pid=PID&id=ID&text=Name&CompanyID=xxxxxx" DisplayMember="text" ValueMember="id" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&JobID=&DeptID='+rec.id;
var url1='/Share/Query?name=GetPositionByDeptID&DeptID='+rec.id;
$('#HireDate').textbox('setValue','');
$('#State').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Bank').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Account').textbox('setValue','');
$('#BaseSalary').textbox('setValue','');
$('#PostSalary').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Yanglaojin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Yiliaojin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Shiyejin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Gongjijin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Tuanfei').textbox('setValue','');
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url});
$('#Position').combobox({url:url1});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="Position" Name="Position" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false" Binding="Pname" IsRequired="false" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetPositionByDeptID&DeptID=xxxxxx" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&DeptID='+$('#Department').combotree('getValue')+'&JobID='+rec.ID;
$('#HireDate').textbox('setValue','');
$('#State').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Bank').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Account').textbox('setValue','');
$('#BaseSalary').textbox('setValue','');
$('#PostSalary').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Yanglaojin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Yiliaojin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Shiyejin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Gongjijin').textbox('setValue','');
$('#Tuanfei').textbox('setValue','');
$('#EmployeeID').combobox({url:url});
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="姓名" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="EmployeeID" Name="EmployeeID" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择员工'" Length="8" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="ID" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetEmpByDeptAndJob&DeptID=xxxxxx&JobID=xxxxxx" IsAutoHeight="false" OnSelect="function(rec){
var url='/Page/P01046/Info?ID='+rec.ID;
 $.ajax({
 url: url,
 type: 'post',
 success: function (result)
 {
var r=result.Data[0];
$('#Position').textbox('setValue',r['Pname']);
$('#HireDate').textbox('setValue',r['HireDate']);
$('#State').textbox('setValue',r['State']);
$('#Bank').textbox('setValue',r['Bank'])
$('#Account').textbox('setValue',r['Account'])
$('#BaseSalary').textbox('setValue',r['BaseSalary']);
$('#PostSalary').textbox('setValue',r['PostSalary']);
$('#Yanglaojin').textbox('setValue',r['Yanglaojin']);
$('#Yiliaojin').textbox('setValue',r['Yiliaojin']);
$('#Shiyejin').textbox('setValue',r['Shiyejin']);
$('#Gongjijin').textbox('setValue',r['Gongjijin']);
$('#Tuanfei').textbox('setValue',r['Tuanfei']);
 },
 error: function (d, error) {
 showError(error);
 }
 });
}" /> </Field> <Field Title="入职日期" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="HireDate" Name="HireDate" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="HireDate" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" /> </Field> <Field Title="状态" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="State" Name="State" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="State" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" /> </Field> <Field Title="公司银行" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="Bank" Name="Bank" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="mode:'remote',editable:false,missingMessage:'请选择银行'" Binding="Bank" Length="6" DisplayMember="BankName" ValueMember="BankName" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetBankByCompanyID&CompanyID=xxxxxx" /> </Field> <Field Title="员工账号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Account" Name="Account" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入账号',validType:'bankInt[16,19]',invalidMessage:'请输入有效账号'" Binding="Account" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="基本工资" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="BaseSalary" Name="BaseSalary" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入基本工资',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99,required:true" Binding="BaseSalary" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位工资" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="PostSalary" Name="PostSalary" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入职位工资',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99,required:true" Binding="PostSalary" /> </Field> <Field Title="养老金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Yanglaojin" Name="Yanglaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入养老金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Yanglaojin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="医疗金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Yiliaojin" Name="Yiliaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入医疗金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Yiliaojin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="失业金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Shiyejin" Name="Shiyejin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入失业金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Shiyejin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="公积金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Gongjijin" Name="Gongjijin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入公积金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Gongjijin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="团费" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Tuanfei" Name="Tuanfei" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入团费',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Tuanfei" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01046"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-add" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="8" Action="submitAct_DGAddUpd('dataform','/Page/P01046/Add','datagrid')" /> <UIButton Tag="a" ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Add
Action.Title: 新增

Command.Name: 执行新增
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行新增].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="新增结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_SalarySet" CommandName="Add" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="BaseSalary" Path="Request[BaseSalary]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="PostSalary" Path="Request[PostSalary]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Yanglaojin" Path="Request[Yanglaojin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Yiliaojin" Path="Request[Yiliaojin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Shiyejin" Path="Request[Shiyejin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Gongjijin" Path="Request[Gongjijin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Cantie" Path="Request[Cantie]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Tuanfei" Path="Request[Tuanfei]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="Request[EmployeeID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CompanyID" Path="Request[Company]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="DeptID" Path="Request[Department]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Bank" Path="Request[Bank]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Account" Path="Request[Account]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/xml"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行新增].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行新增].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行新增].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CID" Path="Results[查询公司].Value" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]" EditPanelClass="edit-panel-w2"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="公司" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Company" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Cname" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="部门" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Department" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Dname" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Position" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Pname" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="姓名" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="EName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Ename" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="8" /> </Field> <Field Title="公司银行" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" Name="Bank" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Options="missingMessage:'请选择银行',mode:'remote',editable:false" Binding="Bank" Length="6" DisplayMember="BankName" ValueMember="BankName" DataUrl="/Share/Query?name=GetBankByCompanyID&CompanyID={@/Parameters[CID]}" /> </Field> <Field Title="员工账号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Account" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入账号',validType:'bankInt[16,19]',invalidMessage:'请输入有效账号'" Binding="Account" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="基本工资" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="BaseSalary" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入基本工资',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99,required:true" Binding="BaseSalary" /> </Field> <Field Title="职位工资" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="PostSalary" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入职位工资',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99,required:true" Binding="PostSalary" /> </Field> <Field Title="养老金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Yanglaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入养老金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Yanglaojin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="医疗金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Yiliaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入医疗金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Yiliaojin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="失业金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Shiyejin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入失业金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Shiyejin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="公积金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Gongjijin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入公积金',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Gongjijin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="团费" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Tuanfei" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="missingMessage:'请输入团费',precision:2,groupSeparator:',',decimalSeparator:'.',min:0,max:99999999.99" Binding="Tuanfei" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="AutoKey" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="AutoKey" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="AutoKey" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01046"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-update" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="16" Action="submitAct_DGUpdate('dataform','/Page/P01046/Update','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Update
Action.Title: 修改
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" NextCommand="编辑结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_SalarySet" CommandName="Update"> <Parameter Name="Bank" Path="Request[Bank]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Account" Path="Request[Account]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="BaseSalary" Path="Request[BaseSalary]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="PostSalary" Path="Request[PostSalary]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Yanglaojin" Path="Request[Yanglaojin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Yiliaojin" Path="Request[Yiliaojin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Shiyejin" Path="Request[Shiyejin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Gongjijin" Path="Request[Gongjijin]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="Tuanfei" Path="Request[Tuanfei]" Type="Parameter" DefaultValue="0" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="AutoKey" Path="Request[AutoKey]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行更新].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行更新].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行更新].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: EditP
Action.Title: 批量修改

Command.Name: 查看页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command:
<EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="IDs" Path="Request[keys]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Typ" Type="Const" DefaultValue="全部" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="类别" FieldType="ComboBox"> <ComboBox Tag="input" ID="Types" Class="edit-input easyui-combobox" Binding="\Parameters[Typ]" DisplayMember="Name" ValueMember="Name" DataUrl="/Share/GetSystemCodes?code=C034" OnSelect="function (rec) {
 if (rec.Name == '团费') { 
 $('.edit-field:eq(1),.edit-field:eq(2),.edit-field:eq(3),.edit-field:eq(4)').hide();
$('.edit-field:eq(5)').show();
$('.textbox-text:eq(1)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(2)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(3)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(4)').val('');
$('input[name=\'Yanglaojin\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Yiliaojin\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Shiyejin\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Gongjijin\']').val('');
}
 else if (rec.Name == '公积金') { 
 $('.edit-field:eq(1),.edit-field:eq(2),.edit-field:eq(3),.edit-field:eq(5)').hide();
$('.edit-field:eq(4)').show();
$('.textbox-text:eq(1)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(2)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(3)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(5)').val('');
$('input[name=\'Yanglaojin\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Yiliaojin\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Shiyejin\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Tuanfei\']').val('');
}
 else if (rec.Name == '社保') { 
 $('.edit-field:eq(4),.edit-field:eq(5)').hide();
$('.edit-field:eq(1),.edit-field:eq(2),.edit-field:eq(3)').show();
$('.textbox-text:eq(4)').val('');
$('.textbox-text:eq(5)').val('');
$('input[name=\'Tuanfei\']').val('');
$('input[name=\'Gongjijin\']').val('');
} 
 else { 
$('.edit-field:eq(1),.edit-field:eq(2),.edit-field:eq(3),.edit-field:eq(4),.edit-field:eq(5)').show(); }
 }" /> </Field> <Field Title="养老金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Yanglaojin" Name="Yanglaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:','" Binding="Yanglaojin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="医疗金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Yiliaojin" Name="Yiliaojin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:','" Binding="Yiliaojin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="失业金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Shiyejin" Name="Shiyejin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:','" Binding="Shiyejin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="公积金" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Gongjijin" Name="Gongjijin" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:','" Binding="Gongjijin" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="团费" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="Tuanfei" Name="Tuanfei" Class="edit-input easyui-numberbox" Options="precision:2,groupSeparator:','" Binding="Tuanfei" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="IDs" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="IDs" Name="IDs" Class="edit-input" InputType="hidden" Binding="/Parameters[IDs]" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" IsHidden="true" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01046"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-update" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="16" Action="submitAct_DGUpdate('dataform','/Page/P01046/UpdateP','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>
